name: S.P.E.E.D
description:
Game made in 7 days for the 3rd BlackthornProd Game Jam.
The theme is "Less is more".

You play a series of levels in which each completion offers you a new way to finish the level, but you have less time to finish it ! Learn about your surroundings and find the best solution in this 3D physics based game !

⚠ If the game won't launch try to use a different browser (like google chrome) ⚠
(Or we have a downloadable .zip in case of)

Credits : 

- Musics : Delirium - Liru, Tape Kid - White Drift

- Texture : Gridbox Prototype Materials by Ciathyza
